#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100003
#define eps  1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;


string s[4];
int l1,l2,l3,l4;
int dp[101][101][101][101];
int vis[101][101][101][101];
int timer=1;
int maxe(int a,int b,int c,int d){
	return max(a,max(b,max(c,d)));
}
int go(int idx1,int idx2,int idx3,int idx4){
	if((idx1==l1)||(idx2==l2)||(idx3==l3)||(idx4==l4))
	return 0;
	
	if(vis[idx1][idx2][idx3][idx4]==timer)
	return dp[idx1][idx2][idx3][idx4];
	
	vis[idx1][idx2][idx3][idx4]=timer;
	
	int ret=0;
	if((s[0][idx1]==s[1][idx2])&&(s[0][idx1]==s[2][idx3])&&(s[0][idx1]==s[3][idx4]))
	ret=1+go(idx1+1,idx2+1,idx3+1,idx4+1);
	else
	ret=maxe(go(idx1+1,idx2,idx3,idx4),go(idx1,idx2+1,idx3,idx4),go(idx1,idx2,idx3+1,idx4),go(idx1,idx2,idx3,idx4+1));
	
	dp[idx1][idx2][idx3][idx4]=ret;
	return ret;
}
int main(){
	int i,t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		timer++;
		for(i=0;i<4;i++)
		cin>>s[i];
		l1=s[0].length();
		l2=s[1].length();
		l3=s[2].length();
		l4=s[3].length();
		int comn=go(0,0,0,0);
		int ans=l1+l2+l3+l4;
		ans-=4*comn;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
